name: Llewl
description:
Llewl is a project that started out as a writing lesson in diversity for me along with some youtube tutorials I was creating on how to use RPG Maker, I kinda fell for the characters and light natured classic jrpg feel of the game so here we are.

Join Sarah, a trainee cleric from the village of Snowton as she journies to save her be Llewl in an epic journey across the world.

======================================

This game is super early in development and the demo is here mostly to gauge interest in whether its worth pushing on with this project or not. and also to check for potential performance/fps issues with various aspects of rpg maker mz.

Most of all though if you do give it a whirl, enjoy.

----------------------------------------------------------------
